alert.note: Alert for Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 26 at 2:17AM MDT until April 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the Snowies, with locally higher amounts possible on mountain peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult in the Snowies. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most snow is expected in the morning and early afternoon Thursday, with snow slowly tapering off through the late afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
